title: Set Up Development Environment
description: Configure the development environment on the new employee's laptop, including installation of IDEs, local databases, and access to internal repositories.

title: Compliance Training
description: Complete the mandatory compliance training for understanding the regulatory environment and data protection standards.

title: Introduction to Scrum Team
description: Schedule a meeting for the new team member to meet the Scrum team, including Scrum Master and Product Owner.

title: Project Documentation Review
description: Review existing project documentation to get familiar with the architecture and business logic.

title: Security Protocols Briefing
description: Understand the internal security protocols, including VPN access, password policies, and secure coding practices.

title: Codebase Walkthrough
description: Go through the main repositories to understand the code structure and major components.

title: Setup Email and Communication Tools
description: Set up email accounts and access to communication tools like Slack, Microsoft Teams, or other internal communication software.
